title: Related rates involving a sphere part - b

content.question: At the time when the volume of the sphere is <math> <mrow> <mn> 36 </mn> <mi> π </mi> </mrow> </math> cubic centimeters, what is the rate of increase of the area of a cross section through the center of the sphere?

frqParts.text: At the time when the volume of the sphere is <math> <mrow> <mn> 36 </mn> <mi> π </mi> </mrow> </math> cubic centimeters, what is the rate of increase of the area of a cross section through the center of the sphere?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
